name: complete-goods-data
success_message: Please wait. You will be redirected to the confirmation overview.
success_title: Thank you for completing the Goods Data!
title: Please Confirm the Goods Data

web_form_fields.label: Advice
web_form_fields.options:
Are you the manufacturer of this product?

I am able to provide the emission data of this product – Select this option if you are able to provide all the necessary data, including emission information. Choose this if you manufactured the entire mass of the purchased product or can provide the necessary production information on behalf of the manufacturer.

The mass of this product needs to be split into several parts, due to shared responsibilities. I will assign the responsible parties – Choose this option if the production of the requested amount is split between multiple parties. You may be responsible for some amount of the purchased good, but others (e.g., colleagues or sub-suppliers) are responsibly for the remaining mass. You will need to assign the relevant amounts of the good to the parties who can provide the necessary information.

I am not able to provide emission data and will delegate this request – Select this option if you are not able to provide the requested emission data. You will forward the request to the correct party (either internal or external) who can supply the required information.

This item was not purchased from us. I want to reject this request back to the sender – Only choose this option, if the requested good was not purchased from/via the company you work for.

web_form_fields.default: I am able to provide the emission data of this product
web_form_fields.label: Manufacture
web_form_fields.options:
I am able to provide the emission data of this product
The mass of this product needs to be split into several parts, due to shared responsibilities. I will assign the responsible parties
I am not able to provide emission data and will delegate this request
This item was not purchased from us. I want to reject this request back to the sender.

web_form_fields.depends_on: eval:doc.manufacture=="The mass of this product needs to be split into several parts, due to shared responsibilities. I will assign the responsible parties" || doc.manufacture == "I am not able to provide emission data and will delegate this request"
web_form_fields.label: Add Employee
web_form_fields.options:
Important

If other employees (internal) or external suppliers are responsible for any amounts of the product, please ensure they are added to the list of Employees/Sub-suppliers before proceeding. This will allow for a smooth delegation of responsibilities and ensure all required data is provided accurately.

Add Employee Add Supplier

web_form_fields.depends_on: eval:doc.manufacture=="I am not able to provide emission data and will delegate this request"
